mapper.sql: ck.fUuid AS `uuid`, ck.fType AS `type`, ck.fCustomerKeywordUuid AS `customerKeywordUuid`, ck.fPositionNumber AS `positionNumber`, ck.fIndexCount AS `indexCount`, ck.fIP AS `ip`, ck.fUpdateTime AS `updateTime`, ck.fCreateTime AS `createTime`
mapper.select:
select
from t_ck_position_index_log ck where 1=1 AND ck.fCustomerKeywordUuid = #{conditionMap.customerKeywordUuid} AND ck.fType = #{conditionMap.terminalType} AND ck.fCreateTime>=date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -${conditionMap.dayCount} DAY) ORDER BY fCreateTime DESC
